NK036(chi)008:1: // spros bcas dbang gi phyag bzhed dang po'i dpe las
NK036(chi)008:2: lag len khrigs su sdebs pa rje btsun seng ge
NK036(chi)008:3: dbang phyug gis mdzad pa bzhugs so //
NK036(chi)008:4: man ngag gnyis pa nang tshan gyi dgongs 'grel /
NK036(chi)008:5: dbang thams cad kyi mnga' bdag rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK036(chi)008:6: nges pa'i lung la dad pa'i gdeng rnyed skal ldan bu //
NK036(chi)008:7: 'phangs pa'i srog nor dam pa'i don la gtong phod can //
NK036(chi)008:8: sbyangs pa'i 'phro can blo yis rtse mor 'jug pa'i don //
NK036(chi)008:9: dbang rnams kun gyi gnad bsdus nges pa bdag gis bkrol //
NK036(chi)008:10: tshig gi dbang la bye brag bsam yas kyang //
NK036(chi)008:11: gnad kyi man ngag snying por phyung ba ni //
NK036(chi)008:12: spros bcas dbang gi tshig don mthong ba'i don //
NK036(chi)008:13: nges par bsdus la lag len khris su sdebs //
NK036(chi)008:14: de la skal ba ma chog dang ldan pa'i slob
NK036(chi)008:15: ma dam tshig rang gi srog ltar gces pa gnyis
NK036(chi)008:17: de bas mang na d+h+aa ki'i bka' chad 'ong nges pas bu mchog de rnams la bstan par bya'o //
NK036(chi)008:18: de la spros pa la dga' ba rnams kyis dbang
NK036(chi)008:19: nges par 'byed pa'i tshig don 'di la gzhan rnams
NK036(chi)008:20: nas rgya che bar bstan kyang /
NK036(chi)008:21: de rnams kyis don gyi gnad gtan la mi phebs te /
NK036(chi)008:22: dper na lung pa stong pa'i rlung sgra dang 'dra ste don la kha g.yel bas /
NK036(chi)008:23: dbang dngos kyi lag khrigs bla ma'i phyag len nyams
NK036(chi)008:24: kyi man ngag dngos yin pas phyir sems la gab
NK036(chi)008:25: par bya'o // de'i don nges pa'i dbang mchog len
NK036(chi)008:26: par 'dod pa'i skal ldan gyis gnad nges pa'i tshig
NK036(chi)008:28: de la nges pa don gyi dbang gi sngon du
NK036(chi)008:29: 'gro ba slob dpon gyi 'brel pa brtag pa dang
NK036(chi)008:30: gcig / dngos gzhi dbang nges pa'i bya ba lag khrigs kyi go rim bstan pa dang gnyis /
NK036(chi)008:31: rjes kyi bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i spyod lam gyi tshul bstan pas nges par bya'o //
NK036(chi)008:33: slob dpon slob ma'i 'brel pa brtag pa la /
NK036(chi)008:34: dang po bla ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
NK036(chi)008:35: mtshan nyid mi ldan na nges pa'i 'bras bu 'byin mi nus pas /
NK036(chi)008:36: de'i mtshan nyid mdo rgyud la sogs tshig gi don la nges par sbyong ba dang gcig /
NK036(chi)008:37: mngon sum don gyi gnas lugs la rtogs pa'i lam sbyong ba dang gnyis /
NK036(chi)008:38: tshogs gnyis la sogs bsags pa mthar phyin pas rgyud
NK036(chi)008:39: thog tu smin cing sgo gsum gyis gzhan gyi rgyud
NK036(chi)008:40: smin nus pa'o // slob ma'i mtshan nyid nges pa'i gdams pa'i snod brtag pa ni /
NK036(chi)008:41: don dam pa'i bla ma la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang gcig /
NK036(chi)008:42: dad pa'i zhing sa bzang bas mi dge ba'i phyogs su dug sbrul ltar spong ba dang gnyis /
NK036(chi)008:43: 'khrul pa'i don rig pas 'jig rten gyi bdog pa la mi chags shig gtong nus pa dang gsum /
NK036(chi)008:44: mdor na lus dang srog thams cad dam pa'i don la blo bsgyur nus pa dang bzhi'o //
NK036(chi)008:45: dngos gzhi dbang nges pa'i lag khrigs la gnyis /
NK036(chi)008:46: bsham pa rdzas kyi rim pa chas su gzhug pa dang gcig /
NK036(chi)008:47: smin bya slob ma'i cho ga nges pa dngos so //
NK036(chi)008:49: gnas khyad par can du dal bsham pa dang gcig /
NK036(chi)008:50: der bsags pa'i rdzas kyi rim pa 'god pa'o //
NK036(chi)008:51: dang po dal bri ba ni /
NK036(chi)008:52: dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i gnas su /
NK036(chi)008:53: dal 'dom gru bzhi la ba'i rnam lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga'i chag chag 'thor bar byas la /
NK036(chi)008:54: thig dang rdul tshon byin gyis brlabs pa spyi dang mthun /
NK036(chi)008:55: dbus mthing ga zlum po la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad phyogs tshon dang mtshams mdzes tshon du bya'o //
NK036(chi)008:56: gru chad sgo dang sgo rgyan rta babs rdo rje'i
NK036(chi)008:57: ra ba me ri'i phreng ba 'od zer gyis bskor
NK036(chi)008:58: ba bri'o // gnyis pa bsag pa'i rdzas kyi bya ba ni /
NK036(chi)008:59: phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar rin po che'i bum pa
NK036(chi)008:60: kha dog phyogs tshon la rigs lnga'i sa bon +amo
NK036(chi)008:61: +aahmh'u s+w+aa h+aa / zhes pa bris la 'god do //
NK036(chi)008:62: kha rgyan mgul rgyan dang bcas pa'i nang rin chen lnga /
NK036(chi)008:67: gtsang ma'i chu dang 'o ma la sogs dkar gsum dang /
NK036(chi)008:68: bu ram la sogs mngar gsum gyis bkang ngo //
NK036(chi)008:69: bum pa lnga'i steng du mda' lnga /
NK036(chi)008:75: gsang dbang gi ras thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba dgod /
NK036(chi)008:76: dbang gsum pa'i rdzas rig ma mtshan ldan yang bzhag go //
NK036(chi)008:77: gzhan yang sgo bzhir phur pa bzhi /
NK036(chi)008:78: mtshams bzhir ral gri bzhi dgod do //
NK036(chi)008:79: gzhan yang phyi'i mchod pa lnga /
NK036(chi)008:82: tshogs kyi mchod pa rgya chen po dang /
NK036(chi)008:83: mkha' 'gro dang chos skyong gi gtor ma rgya chen po bsham mo //
NK036(chi)008:84: bla bres dang thang sku la sogs pa ci rigs pas gnas brgyan par bya'o //
NK036(chi)008:85: gnyis pa slob ma'i bya ba la gnyis /
NK036(chi)008:86: 'jug par byed pa slob ma'i sngon 'gro dang /
NK036(chi)008:87: byin brlab kyi byed pa slob dpon gyi las so //
NK036(chi)008:89: dbang gi gsol ba gdab pa dang gcig /
NK036(chi)008:90: bla mas gnang ba byin zhing skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dpog pa dang gnyis /
NK036(chi)008:91: bsrung ba gdags shing ye shes dbab pa dang gsum /
NK036(chi)008:92: me tog gtor zhing ming gdags pa dang bzhi /
NK036(chi)008:93: mig dbye zhing mthong ba bstan pa dang lnga'o //
NK036(chi)008:94: dang po gsol ba gdab pa ni /
NK036(chi)008:95: e ma hoh skyes chen 'gro mgon bla ma rje
NK036(chi)008:96: bdag ni las can shes rab bu gsang bar nges
NK036(chi)008:97: pa'i lung 'di la rtag par bdag ni gzung du
NK036(chi)008:98: gsol zhes lan gsum zhu ba dbul lo //
NK036(chi)008:99: gnyis pa bla ma rjes gnang sbyin zhing skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dpog pa la gsum /
NK036(chi)008:104: e ma hohskala ldan sems kyi bu mchog tu gsang
NK036(chi)008:105: ba'i theg pa 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gi
NK036(chi)008:106: lung zhugs nas 'bras bu nges thob 'gyur bdag nyid
NK036(chi)008:107: chen po khyod kyis ni blo yi the tshom rab
NK036(chi)008:108: bsal nas nor bu'i yon tan mthong ba bzhin bdag
NK036(chi)008:109: la bla mar spro lags sam zhes dri /
NK036(chi)008:110: slob mas spro lags zhes brjod do //
NK036(chi)008:112: rang lus 'khor lo bzhi rtsa rlung thig le'i gnas lugs dran par byas la /
NK036(chi)008:113: rlung lnga rnam dag dwangs ma'i sku nyon mongs rnam
NK036(chi)008:114: dag ye shes lnga sku gsum mdzad pa mthar phyin
NK036(chi)008:115: pa dkon mchog gsum la rtogs pas 'dud ces lan
NK036(chi)008:116: gsum gyi rjes la de'i don bshad do //
NK036(chi)008:117: gsum pa sems bskyed pa ni /
NK036(chi)008:118: lam gyi snang bzhi'i don dran par byas la 'di skad du /
NK036(chi)008:119: kye ma hoh ma rig 'jig rten mun pa'i klong
NK036(chi)008:120: rang gi thabs shes sgron ma yis rang la gnas
NK036(chi)008:121: pa'i ye shes de bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs par
NK036(chi)008:122: bya'o zhes lan gsum gyi rjes la smon pa'i don
NK036(chi)008:124: e ma ho sangs rgyas mthar thug dbyings rig gnyis
NK036(chi)008:125: sku gsum ngo bo mtha' bral bzhi tshig las 'das
NK036(chi)008:126: pa'i rang byung de da lta nyid du rtogs par
NK036(chi)008:127: bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod pa'i rjes la 'jug pa'i
NK036(chi)008:128: don bshad do // bsrung ba gdags shing ye shes dbab pa la gnyis /
NK036(chi)008:129: bsrung ba gdags pa ye shes dbab pa'o //
NK036(chi)008:130: dang po tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la gnas pa'i rtsa yig las /
NK036(chi)008:133: +amo swa b+h+aa wa shu d+d+ha sarba d+har+m+aa swa b+h+aa
NK036(chi)008:134: wa shud+ho &aham zhes pas sngags mdud byas la pho'i
NK036(chi)008:135: dpung pa g.yas mo'i dpung pa g.yon pa la gdags
NK036(chi)008:136: so // gnyis pa ye shes dbab pa ni /
NK036(chi)008:137: slob ma lus gnad rdo rje skyil krung bca' ru bcug la /
NK036(chi)008:138: 'khor lo bzhi rtsa yig dang kun bzang yab yum
NK036(chi)008:139: gsal gdab la steng 'og gi rlung kha sbyar la
NK036(chi)008:140: shes pa ma yengs shig byas la dmigs pa ni
NK036(chi)008:141: / tshig gi don bsam zhing bla mas d+aa ma ru dkrol zhing 'di skad do //
NK036(chi)008:142: e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu lte ba sprul
NK036(chi)008:143: pa'i 'khor lo ni sprul pa sku yi bzhugs gnas
NK036(chi)008:144: yin rlung lnga g.yo rtsol las 'das pa thig le
NK036(chi)008:145: 'od skur shigs se shig e ma skal ldan rigs
NK036(chi)008:146: kyi bu snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ni chos
NK036(chi)008:147: kyi sku yi bzhugs gnas yin sangs rgyas rigs lnga
NK036(chi)008:148: me re re e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu
NK036(chi)008:149: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ni longs spyod rdzogs
NK036(chi)008:150: sku'i bzhugs gnas yin mtshan dang dpe byad 'khyugs pa
NK036(chi)008:151: yin thig le 'od skur ya la la e ma
NK036(chi)008:152: skal ldan rigs kyi bu spyi bo bde ba'i 'khor
NK036(chi)008:153: lo na sku gsum 'dus pa'i bzhugs gnas yin 'bras
NK036(chi)008:154: bu 'dus pa'i rtse mo can khro rgyal gad rgyangs
NK036(chi)008:155: ya la la zhes pa de dag gi dmigs pa
NK036(chi)008:157: bzhi pa me tog dor zhing ming gdags pa la gnyis /
NK036(chi)008:158: me tog dor ba dang ming gdags pa'o //
NK036(chi)008:159: dang po ni dar sna lnga'i 'phan dar byas la /
NK036(chi)008:160: thal mo'i bar du bzung nas /
NK036(chi)008:161: mig dar nag pos bkab la 'di skad do //
NK036(chi)008:162: e ma hoh thog ma 'od gsal snying po nas
NK036(chi)008:163: da ltar theg mchog 'di phrad par gzhi la sbyangs
NK036(chi)008:164: pa'i las 'bras kyis rigs mchog de la 'bab par
NK036(chi)008:165: shog ces pas pho brang dbus su dor ro //
NK036(chi)008:166: gnyis pa ming gdag pa ni /
NK036(chi)008:169: shar du rdo rje snying po /
NK036(chi)008:171: nub tu bde chen rgyal po /
NK036(chi)008:172: byang du sgo lnga bya bral du ming gdags so //
NK036(chi)008:173: de nas mig dbye zhing mthong ba bstan pa la gnyis te /
NK036(chi)008:174: mig dbye ba dang mthong ba bstan pa'o //
NK036(chi)008:176: kye ma rdo rje 'dzin mgon rje bdag ni khams
NK036(chi)008:177: gsum 'khor bar ldongs rje yis ye shes thur ma
NK036(chi)008:178: yis bdag gi ma rig bsal du gsol zhes so
NK036(chi)008:180: kye ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu sngon chad gzung
NK036(chi)008:181: 'dzin 'khrul pas bzung rang la bzhag nas gzhan du
NK036(chi)008:182: btsal thur ma yid bzhin nor bus mtshon zhes gser
NK036(chi)008:183: gyi thur mas mig dar bsal la /
NK036(chi)008:184: de dag gi don du bshad do //
NK036(chi)008:185: gnyis pa mthong ba bstan pa la bzhi ste /
NK036(chi)008:189: de nas mched lcam gyi mthong ba bstan pa'o //
NK036(chi)008:191: ltos shig ltos shig rigs kyi bu ma yengs sems
NK036(chi)008:192: kyis nga la ltos nga la mthong ba sna tshogs
NK036(chi)008:193: pa'o bu khyod kyis ni cir mthong smros zhes brjod
NK036(chi)008:194: pas / bu yis bla ma sangs rgyas su mthong ba lags zhes brjod do //
NK036(chi)008:195: gnyis pa da la'i mthong ba bstan pa ni /
NK036(chi)008:196: ltos shig mig can skal ldan bu dal la bzang
NK036(chi)008:197: po'i gnas 'di ltos dad pa'i mchog ni bskyed re
NK036(chi)008:198: ran khyod kyis da la ci ru mthong zhes dris
NK036(chi)008:199: pas / la las dkar po shas cher mthong /
NK036(chi)008:200: la las dmar po la sogs pa mthong ba 'byung bas da la'i de nyid bshad do //
NK036(chi)008:202: e ma lta shes skal ldan bu brda' dang dam
NK036(chi)008:203: rdzas bkod pa'i tshogs gnas lugs mtshon pa'i rdzas 'di
NK036(chi)008:204: ltos mthong ba'i don ni bdag la smos zhes pa
NK036(chi)008:205: skal ba dang ldan pa de rnams kyis /
NK036(chi)008:206: ji bzhin nyid du don shes so //
NK036(chi)008:207: de nas rdzas kyi de bzhin nyid bshad do //
NK036(chi)008:209: e ma ngo mtshar rigs kyi bu grogs kyi dam
NK036(chi)008:210: pa gang yin pa 'jug sgo bzhi pa'i spun grogs
NK036(chi)008:211: la khyod kyi cir mthong bdag la smros dag pa'i
NK036(chi)008:212: snang ba mthong re ran zhes pa de nyid kyis
NK036(chi)008:214: de la da la'i de nyid bshad pa ni /
NK036(chi)008:215: dbus zlum po mthing gar byung ba ni chos nyid kyi don la gnyen po dang bral ba'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:216: pad+ma 'dab brgyad mdzes tshon du byung ba ni gzhi la rlung lnga'i dwangs ma dang ldan pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:217: gru chad bzhi ru byung ba ni 'byung bzhi'i 'od bzhi dang ldan pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:218: khyams bzhi sgo dang bcas pa ni phrin las rnam bzhi rang la tshang ba'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:219: pad rag gi rtsig pa ni ye shes lnga'i ra ba dang ldan pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:220: rta babs bzhi ni gzhi la tshad med pa bzhi lhun gyis grub pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:221: 'dod yon gyi lha mo ni 'dod yon ma spangs rgyan du shar ba'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:222: d+r+wa ba dang d+r+wa phyeed ni gzhi'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:223: pha gu ser po ni 'dod dgu rang las 'byung ba'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:224: rdo rje'i ra ba ni don la 'gyur ba med pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:225: 'od zer phreng bas bskor ba ni sku lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:226: gnyis pa rdzas kyi de nyid bshad pa ni /
NK036(chi)008:227: bum pa lnga ru byung ba ni /
NK036(chi)008:228: rig pa lnga rang la rdzogs pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:229: shel lnga ni gzhi ka nas dag pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:230: rma bya'i mdongs lnga ni sgron ma lnga rang la gsal ba'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:231: mda' lnga ni shes rab lnga mtshon pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:232: me long lnga ni ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:233: dar sna lnga ni rlung lnga mtshon pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:234: phur pa lnga ni dbyings rnam par dag pa la 'gyur ba med pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:235: gri lnga ni mngal gyi grong gyer 'joms pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:236: tshogs gtor dang mchod pa ni 'dod yon rang sprul du shar ba'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)008:237: gnyis pa byin brlabs slob dpon gyis bya ba bzhi las /
NK036(chi)008:238: dang po bum pa'i dbang dang /
NK036(chi)008:239: gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang dang /
NK036(chi)008:240: gsum pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang /
NK036(chi)008:241: bzhi pa nges pa'i tshig don ngo sprod kyi dbang ngo //
NK036(chi)008:243: slob ma lus gnad rdo rje'i skyil krung bca' ru gzhug /
NK036(chi)008:244: bla mas dbus kyi bum pa blangs la slob ma'i spyir bor bzhag la /
NK036(chi)008:246: chos nyid dbyings kyi bum pa ru stong gsal rang
NK036(chi)008:247: byung chu yis bkang skal ldan bu la dbang bskur
NK036(chi)008:248: bas dbyings kyi gnas lugs rtogs par shog k+aa li'i
NK036(chi)008:249: yi ge'i tshogs brjod pa'i rjes la spyi bo'i rtsa
NK036(chi)008:250: gnas kyi yi ge rnams brjod la dbang bskur la
NK036(chi)008:264: spyi bor chu thigs pa blug go //
NK036(chi)008:265: de nas shar kyi bum pa blangs la snying gar bzhag la /
NK036(chi)008:266: h+aum ma skyes snying po'i bum pa ru 'gags med
NK036(chi)008:267: rang byung rdzas kyis bkang skal ldan bu la dbang
NK036(chi)008:268: bskur bas 'jigs bral bzhi yi don rtogs shog ces
NK036(chi)008:269: pas +aa li'i rjes la dran pa 'dus pa'i rtsa
NK036(chi)008:270: yig rnams brjod la dbang bskur ro //
NK036(chi)008:271: kha tsha da ta pha ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK036(chi)008:273: zhes pas snying khar chu'i thig le bya'o //
NK036(chi)008:274: de nas lho'i bum pa btegs la mgrin par gtad la /
NK036(chi)008:275: h+aum rang byung ye shes bum pa ru 'dod yon
NK036(chi)008:276: rang sprul rdzas kyis bkang skal ldan bu la dbang
NK036(chi)008:277: bskur bas bsam pa lhun grub dbang thob shog ces
NK036(chi)008:278: pa dang / +aa li'i rjes la ro rnams 'dus pa'i rtsa yig rnams brjod la dbang bskur te /
NK036(chi)008:279: ra r+aa li l+ai a +aa +ae zhes pas chu thigs gcig blud do //
NK036(chi)008:280: de nas nub kyi bum pa btegs la lte bar gtad do //
NK036(chi)008:281: h'u ma skyes chags bral bum pa ru bde chen
NK036(chi)008:282: rgyun spro'i rdzas kyis bkang skal ldan khyed la dbang
NK036(chi)008:283: bskur bas chags pa 'dzin med dbang thob shog +aa
NK036(chi)008:284: li'i rjes la skyed byed kyi rtsa yig rnams brjod
NK036(chi)008:286: a a ta li ha u nya ram yam nam
NK036(chi)008:287: na dza tra sa kham ram yam zhes pas lte
NK036(chi)008:289: de nas byang gi bum pa btegs la gnas bzhi kar btugs shing /
NK036(chi)008:290: +aa li k+aa li'i rjes la 'khor lo bzhi ka'i rtsa yig brjod cing /
NK036(chi)008:291: ha he ho ye shes zang thal bum pa ru
NK036(chi)008:292: 'gag med rlung lnga'i rdzas kyis bkang skal ldan khyod
NK036(chi)008:293: la dbang bskur bas rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i dbang thob
NK036(chi)008:294: shog de nas de rnams kyi tshig don yang bshad
NK036(chi)008:295: par bya'o // gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni /
NK036(chi)008:296: ka p+aa la bdud rtsi chang gis bkang la gnas
NK036(chi)008:297: bzhir bzhag cing slob ma nam gong bzhin lus gnad
NK036(chi)008:298: bcas la / gnas bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis kun bzang yab yum la sbyor ba'i brdas bskul la /
NK036(chi)008:299: de dag gi byang sems kyis rtsa gnas lus kun
NK036(chi)008:300: gang bas bde ba chen po'i ngang la gnas par
NK036(chi)008:301: byas la / h'u bde chen brdal ba rang byung
NK036(chi)008:302: ka p+aa la chags pa dngos bdag kun bzang thig
NK036(chi)008:303: les gang rigs chen skal ldan bu la dbang bskur
NK036(chi)008:304: bas rtsa rlung byang sems dag la dbang thob shog
NK036(chi)008:305: ces +aa li k+aa li'i sngags kyi rjes la /
NK036(chi)008:306: ham am h'u +aah zhes 'khor lo bzhi'i yi ge brjod la tshig don yang bshad do //
NK036(chi)008:307: gsum pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni las
NK036(chi)008:308: rgya dam tshig dang ldan pa la 'khyud la tshig
NK036(chi)008:309: 'dis bskul lo // h'u snang srid bde chen brdal
NK036(chi)008:310: ba'i zhing khams la rol pa'i ye shes bde ba
NK036(chi)008:311: chen por shar thabs shes 'dod pa spyad pas grol
NK036(chi)008:312: 'gyur te ma 'gags rol pas spyod cing bde ba
NK036(chi)008:313: che zhes pas dngos su sbyar bas chags pa'i pra
NK036(chi)008:314: khrid ltar bde ba bskyed do bzhi pa tshig don
NK036(chi)008:316: brda'i don 'di nyid kyis bstan par bya ste /
NK036(chi)008:317: skal ba dang ldan pa'i bu khyod nyon cig nam
NK036(chi)008:318: mkha'i dbyings na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
NK036(chi)008:319: che la nyi zla gnyis shar nas 'dug pa mthong
NK036(chi)008:321: bar snang gi 'ja' tshon la rlung gi zhags pas
NK036(chi)008:322: btab nas 'dug pa mthong ngam rgya mtsho'i nor bu
NK036(chi)008:323: shel gyi rta pho la zhon nas nyi zla'i steng
NK036(chi)008:324: du kyus thag gcod pa de mthong ngam 'byung lnga'i
NK036(chi)008:325: grong khyer du rig drug gi dmag mi bcug nas
NK036(chi)008:326: ri rab kyi steng du song ba'i mi dang khams
NK036(chi)008:327: gsum gyi 'phrang la shel gyi mi pho btson du
NK036(chi)008:328: bzung ba de mthong ngam khams gsum skad cig la
NK036(chi)008:329: bskor nas rang khyim du song ba de mthong ngam
NK036(chi)008:330: zhes brda'i don bzhin bkrol nas tshig 'di bstan par
NK036(chi)008:331: bya ste / e ma hoh ma yengs gson cig
NK036(chi)008:332: rigs kyi bu gzhi la 'khor 'das grub med kyang
NK036(chi)008:333: rten 'brel gyi 'char sgo ngo mtshar che don dam
NK036(chi)008:334: tshig gis mi rtogs kyang mngon sum gding thob ngo
NK036(chi)008:335: mtshar che rig pa skye 'bri med mod kyang lam
NK036(chi)008:336: snang gi 'char tshul ngo mtshar che ka dag grol
NK036(chi)008:337: rgyu ma mchis kyang rlung gi dag tshul ngo mtshar
NK036(chi)008:338: che theg pa'i 'jug sgo mang mod kyang cig car
NK036(chi)008:339: du thob pa ngo mtshar che 'char tshul gyi snang
NK036(chi)008:340: ba rgya che yang ngo bo la gding thob ngo
NK036(chi)008:341: mtshar che tshig mtha' la spros pa mang mod kyang
NK036(chi)008:342: brda gcig gi don mthong ngo mtshar che zhes pa
NK036(chi)008:343: rdo rje'i glus bskul lo de nas dpa' bo'i tshogs
NK036(chi)008:344: dang dpa' mo'i tshogs la dga' ston chen pos mchod
NK036(chi)008:345: mkha' 'gro dang chos skyong la gtor mas mchod do
NK036(chi)008:346: bya ste / // rjes 'od gsal sgyu ma lta bu la gnas par bya'o //
NK036(chi)008:347: spros bcas dbang la tshig don rgya che ba //
NK036(chi)008:348: tshig tu nyung la don la chad med du //
NK036(chi)008:349: lag len dam pa'i phyag bzhes mdor bkod pa //
NK036(chi)008:350: 'dir 'jug smin dang grol ba'i bde thob shog /
NK036(chi)008:351: spros bcas dbang gi phyag bzhes dang po'i dpe las
NK036(chi)008:352: lag len khrigs su sdebs pa lce btsun seng ge
NK036(chi)008:353: dbang phyug gis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
NK036(chi)008:354: sngags kyi srung mas srungs shig /
NK036(chi)008:355: skal ldan gcig dang 'phrad par shog /
NK036(chi)008:357: spros pa med pa'i dbang bskur ba rin po che'i
NK036(chi)008:358: bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so man ngag nga
NK036(chi)008:359: bzhi pa bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la gsol
NK036(chi)008:360: ba gdab cing dri ma dag par byed pa'i tshig
NK036(chi)008:361: 'di dag brjod par bya'o kye bla ma rdo rje
NK036(chi)008:362: 'dzin lha la bdag ni skal ldan snying gi bu
NK036(chi)008:363: dad pas rab tu zhugs par 'tshal ra nga bzhin
NK036(chi)008:364: rdzogs pa chen po yi dbang bskur nang du zhugs
NK036(chi)008:365: lags pas dpa' bo rdo rje bla ma yis rang
NK036(chi)008:366: gi sems kyi gnas lugs kyi a ti'i da la
NK036(chi)008:367: bstan du gsol bdag ni yang dag 'dir zhugs te
NK036(chi)008:368: slar yang log par mi bgyid do zhes rang bzhin
NK036(chi)008:369: rdzogs pa chen po'i dal du 'jug pa'i gsol ba
NK036(chi)008:370: btab nas slob dpon gyis rjes su gnang ba sbyin
NK036(chi)008:371: pa ni e ma bu khyod skal ba bzang skal
NK036(chi)008:372: bzang byang chub sems chen po sngon chad rang bzhin
NK036(chi)008:373: rdzogs pa yi da la nyid du ma zhugs pa
NK036(chi)008:374: do nub skal ldan bu khyod la rdzogs chen da
NK036(chi)008:375: la bstan par bya sems kyi rtogs pa kun sol
NK036(chi)008:376: la 'jig rten bcings pa las grol gyis 'di la
NK036(chi)008:377: spang blang tha snyad bral rigs dang rgyud rnams sbyong
NK036(chi)008:378: ba yi lus ngag bde ba'i rten yin pas deng
NK036(chi)008:379: nas brtsams te slar ma ldog ces rjes su gnang
NK036(chi)008:380: ba'i sbyin nas man+dala shar gyi phyogs su lus kyi
NK036(chi)008:381: gnad tsog pu thal mo sbyar la sems ma yengs
NK036(chi)008:382: par bla ma la dad pas sgom du gzhug de
NK036(chi)008:383: ni bsre ba thun mong ma yin pa ste rdzogs
NK036(chi)008:384: pa chen po mnyam pa'i rgyas btab pa zhes bya'o
NK036(chi)008:385: de nas dal de'i tho phyi rnams su lha bshos
NK036(chi)008:386: dang spos dang mar me la sogs pa mchod pa'i
NK036(chi)008:387: yo byad ci 'byor pa dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams
NK036(chi)008:388: mnyes par byas la bar chad bsal ba'i phyir tshogs
NK036(chi)008:389: dang gtor ma rab tu bzang ba bsham par bya'o
NK036(chi)008:390: de nas spros pa med pa'i dbang bskur ba nang
NK036(chi)008:391: ngag gi nus pa 'jog pa dang ngag rang la
NK036(chi)008:392: 'gro ba'i don yin te slob ma kun so so'i
NK036(chi)008:393: lus bde bar bcos la ngag tu sgra che ba
NK036(chi)008:394: ma yin chung ba ma yin par a a zhes
NK036(chi)008:395: a la yid gtad pa la zhag gcig tu brjod
NK036(chi)008:396: par bya'o de nas nub gnyis pa la +aa li'i
NK036(chi)008:397: tshogs tshang bar brjod la gsum pa la k+aa li'i
NK036(chi)008:398: tshogs tshang bar brjod pa'o 'di'i dus na slob dpon
NK036(chi)008:399: gyis a rkyang ba'i dus na bu yis a brjod
NK036(chi)008:400: pas rtsa thams cad kha bye ste a thol thol
NK036(chi)008:401: rang byung de las 'od kyi gong bu rnams las
NK036(chi)008:402: 'od 'phros pas rang bzhin gyi kun tu bzang po
NK036(chi)008:403: yab yum sbyor ba'i brdas bskul kun bzang yab yum
NK036(chi)008:404: sbyor ba'i byang sems 'od lnga'i rnam pas lus mgo
NK036(chi)008:405: mjug rgyas par gyur pa la blo bzhag 'di'i dus
NK036(chi)008:406: na snang ba'i rlung sgra byung ba'i rtsa btsir ro
NK036(chi)008:407: de ltar slob ma rang yang bsgom du gzhug go
NK036(chi)008:408: de ltar bcug pas nyams su myong ba khyad par
NK036(chi)008:409: can skye bar 'gyur nges so de nas +aa li'i
NK036(chi)008:410: tshogs brjod pa'i dus na de nyid brjod pa tsam
NK036(chi)008:411: gyis rtsa rnams kyi nang nas rang bzhin gyi yi
NK036(chi)008:412: ge rnams rang byung bas rang gi ngag nas kyang
NK036(chi)008:413: chos thams cad kyi sgra si li li 'byung ba
NK036(chi)008:414: la blo bzhag k+aa li'i dus na brjod pa'i yi
NK036(chi)008:415: ge 'di dag phyir ma ston pa rang gi phung
NK036(chi)008:416: po'i nang na yi ges mer gyis khengs pa la
NK036(chi)008:417: blo bzhag go de nas skal ldan la dbang bskur
NK036(chi)008:418: bar bya ste lus gcer bur phyungs la bum pa'i
NK036(chi)008:419: chu dang sin d+hu ra'i thig le spyi bor byas
NK036(chi)008:420: la ngag tu +amo zhes drag por brjod du gzhug
NK036(chi)008:421: slob dpon gyis bu'i mgrin pa'i rtsa gtems 'di'i dus
NK036(chi)008:422: na lus 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang ngag rang 'thol
NK036(chi)008:423: ba dang sems bag yangs su 'gyur ba nyid 'byung
NK036(chi)008:424: ba yin no de nas slob ma'i lus +amo dkar
NK036(chi)008:425: po chen po zhig tu gyur bar dmigs la de
NK036(chi)008:426: 'od du zhu ba la chos nyid kyis rgyas gdab
NK036(chi)008:427: de nas bum pa'i chu'i thigs pa dang sin d+hu
NK036(chi)008:428: ra'i thig le mgrin par byas la ngag tu a
NK036(chi)008:429: a zhes pa drag shul dang bcas par brjod du
NK036(chi)008:430: gzhug slob dpon gyis mchan khung gi rtsa gtems bu'i
NK036(chi)008:431: shes pa nam mkhar drang 'di ltar byas pas lus
NK036(chi)008:432: rab tu 'dar ba dang ngag rab tu 'bar ba
NK036(chi)008:433: dang sems rab tu gsal ba dag 'byung de nas
NK036(chi)008:434: bla mas bu'i lus a dmar po shin tu che
NK036(chi)008:435: ba zhig tu dmigs la chos nyid kyi rgyas gdab
NK036(chi)008:436: de nas bum pa gcig gi chu dag sin d+hu
NK036(chi)008:437: ra'i thig le snying gar byas te ngag tu h'u
NK036(chi)008:438: h'u zhes shin tu ring bar brjod du gzhug bla
NK036(chi)008:439: mas nu ma'i rtsa gtems shes pa 'byung ba la
NK036(chi)008:440: gtad de nas bu'i lus h+aum sngon po zhig tu
NK036(chi)008:441: dmigs la tha ma chos nyid kyi rgyas gdab de
NK036(chi)008:442: yang rtsa gtems pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin bya'o
NK036(chi)008:443: de ltar tsan dan dkar po'i thig le gcig smin
NK036(chi)008:444: mtshams su byug de'i steng du dmar po'i thig le
NK036(chi)008:445: bya'o de'i rjes la stong nyid dar cig bsgom de
NK036(chi)008:446: nas bum pa rnams yi ge'i rang bzhin du dmigs
NK036(chi)008:447: la bu'i ngag la bstim chu dang sman la sogs
NK036(chi)008:448: pa rnams la rang bzhin gyi rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK036(chi)008:449: chos nyid kyi rang sgra byung ste chos thams cad
NK036(chi)008:450: brjod du med pa'o bsam du med pa'o bltar med
NK036(chi)008:451: pa'o gnyis su med pa'o mtshan ma med pa'o smon
NK036(chi)008:452: pa med pa'o spros pa med pa'o spros pa'i mtha'
NK036(chi)008:453: brgyad dang bral ba'o zhes pa'i sgra yang byung ba'i
NK036(chi)008:454: bu de nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur par dmigs
NK036(chi)008:455: la bdag gi ngag tu yang gong gi tshig de
NK036(chi)008:456: rnams brjod par bya'o de nas ngag gi las rdzogs
NK036(chi)008:457: par bya ba'i phyir glu lan gsum blangs gling bu
NK036(chi)008:458: la sogs pa'i sgra'i bye brag rnams bsgrag cing de
NK036(chi)008:459: nyid kyi man ngag bstan par bya'o de nas bdag
NK036(chi)008:460: gi rdzogs pa chen po rang snang rang mnyam pa'i
NK036(chi)008:461: rgyas btab pa'i phyir tshig gi rgyal po 'di dag
NK036(chi)008:462: ngag gi rang bskyed la brjod par bya'o e ma
NK036(chi)008:463: hoh mnyam nyid spros pa med pa'i bde chen de
NK036(chi)008:464: bltar med bsam yul 'das pa ngo mtshar che gnyis
NK036(chi)008:465: med ye shes rang snang kun khyab ni rang rig
NK036(chi)008:466: kun tu snang ba ngo mtshar che bya bral rang
NK036(chi)008:467: bzhin rdzogs chen gnas lugs nyid ma btsal rang las
NK036(chi)008:468: byung ba ngo mtshar che spros bral ngo bo rang
NK036(chi)008:469: bzhin rnam dag la dge sdig mtha' las 'das pa
NK036(chi)008:470: ngo mtshar che rang snang bcos pa med pa'i rig
NK036(chi)008:471: pa nyid lta sgom spyod par snang ba ngo mtshar
NK036(chi)008:472: che rang las byung ba'i rang 'od sgron ma nyid
NK036(chi)008:473: mngon sum yul du snang ba ngo mtshar che ngo
NK036(chi)008:474: bo rang bzhin thugs rje phyogs med las chos sku
NK036(chi)008:475: longs sku sprul sku shar ba ngo mtshar che brjod
NK036(chi)008:476: med rnam par dag pa'i ye shes nyid stong pa'i
NK036(chi)008:477: yul la snang ba ngo mtshar che ma rig mun
NK036(chi)008:478: sel thig le stong pa nyid dbang po'i yul la
NK036(chi)008:479: snang ba ngo mtshar che zhes tshig de dag brjod
NK036(chi)008:480: la de dag gi don yang bshad do de nas
NK036(chi)008:481: rdzogs pa chen po brjod pa las 'das pa'i don
NK036(chi)008:482: de skal ldan gyi blo la gnas par bya ba'i
NK036(chi)008:483: phyir dngos po gang la yang rang bzhin med pa
NK036(chi)008:484: yin no bltar med pa srog med pa snying po
NK036(chi)008:485: med pa dang ya ma barla yin pa dang tshig
NK036(chi)008:486: med pa dang yi ge med pa dang sgra med
NK036(chi)008:487: pa dang tha snyad med pa'o zhes dngos po'i 'dug
NK036(chi)008:488: tshul brjod med du gtan la dbab pa'o tshig rnams
NK036(chi)008:489: kyi don brjod du med pa'i don blo la bskyed
NK036(chi)008:490: par bya'o de la nges shes tsam ma skyes na
NK036(chi)008:491: 'khor ba'i zhen pa dang bral ba' phyir chos thams
NK036(chi)008:492: cad rmi lam lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu
NK036(chi)008:493: dang dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang bar snang
NK036(chi)008:494: gi glog lta bu dang myur byed kyi 'khor lo
NK036(chi)008:495: lta bu la sogs te dpe du mas mtshon nas
NK036(chi)008:496: bstan par bya'o de nyid kyi don gyis 'khor ba'i
NK036(chi)008:497: zhen pa bral nas gong ma'i don la 'jug pa'i
NK036(chi)008:498: dgos pa yod do yang gong ma'i chos rnams la
NK036(chi)008:499: nges shes bskyed pa'i phyir dang 'dod pa rnam dang
NK036(chi)008:500: bral bar bya ba'i phyir 'khor ba la zhen pa'i
NK036(chi)008:501: skyon 'di lta bu yang bstan par bya ste 'khor
NK036(chi)008:502: ba ni dper na zo chu'i rnam pa dang mtshungs
NK036(chi)008:503: pa dang sbrul smyug dong du tshud pa lta bu
NK036(chi)008:504: dang 'dab chags rnyi la zin pa lta bu dang
NK036(chi)008:505: ri dwags rgyar tshud pa lta bu dang phyi'i rgya
NK036(chi)008:506: mtshor gzings thag chad pa lta bu rab tu brgal
NK036(chi)008:507: bar dka' ba'i 'dab rdzab chen por bying ba lta
NK036(chi)008:508: bu / me dpung 'bar ba'i nang du sbrang bu
NK036(chi)008:509: chud pa lta bu dang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i
NK036(chi)008:510: 'phrang du lam nor ba lta bu skyes bu gsod
NK036(chi)008:511: pa'i gshed ma'i dkyil du tshud pa la sogs pa'i
NK036(chi)008:512: dpe du mas bstan no de ltar dran par byas
NK036(chi)008:513: la 'dod pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir 'di
NK036(chi)008:514: dag kyang bstan par bya'o 'dod pa ni dper na
NK036(chi)008:515: skyes pa skom gyis gdung ba zhig la tsh+wa chu
NK036(chi)008:516: blud pa lta bu dang dug gi lo ma lta
NK036(chi)008:517: bu dang dug sbrul gyis zin pa lta bu dang
NK036(chi)008:518: spu gri'i so lta bu dang bud med kyi 'dod
NK036(chi)008:519: chags la sogs pa sgo du ma nas mtshon la
NK036(chi)008:520: bstan par bya'o de nas lus ngag yid gsum rdzogs
NK036(chi)008:521: pa chen po'i stong pa nyid du dar cig sgom
NK036(chi)008:522: du gzhug de nyid kyi don brdas bskul ba'i phyir
NK036(chi)008:523: tshig tu yang 'di skad brjod par bya'o chos rnams
NK036(chi)008:524: thams cad stong zhing bdag med la dngos po mtshan
NK036(chi)008:525: mar 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul chos kyi dbyings nyid
NK036(chi)008:526: spros dang bral ba la spros pa tshig phyir 'brangs
NK036(chi)008:527: pa yong re 'khrul rang rig ye shes 'dod chags
NK036(chi)008:528: bral ba la phyogs 'dzin 'dod pa'i blo 'di yong
NK036(chi)008:529: re 'khrul snying po don gyi ye shes rang shar
NK036(chi)008:530: la gzhan byung rtsol zhing sgrub pa yong re 'khrul
NK036(chi)008:531: sems nyid skye shi gnyis las 'das pa las skye
NK036(chi)008:532: 'gag gnyis su 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul 'bras bu
NK036(chi)008:533: rang rdzogs smon pa bral ba las rnam dpyod dus
NK036(chi)008:534: la ltos pa yong re 'khrul bde sdug thams cad
NK036(chi)008:535: mnyam pa'i cho 'phrul la bde sdug gnyis su lta
NK036(chi)008:536: ba yong re 'khrul kun tu bzang po rang la
NK036(chi)008:537: gnas pa la gzhan du yi dam 'tshol ba yong
NK036(chi)008:538: re 'khrul bdag nyid ye sangs rgyas pa yin pa
NK036(chi)008:539: la ngan song gsum du 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul
NK036(chi)008:540: 'khor ba ngan song rol pa ye shar la yang
NK036(chi)008:541: dag sangs rgyas 'dod pa yang re 'khrul dug lnga
NK036(chi)008:542: ma spangs rang byung chen po la nyon mongs lnga
NK036(chi)008:543: ru 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul 'khrul ba'i snang ba
NK036(chi)008:544: chos sku rang bzhag la dngos po bdag tu 'dzin
NK036(chi)008:545: pa yong re 'khrul theg pa rim dgu'i rang bzhin
NK036(chi)008:546: shar ba la so so'i 'dod gzhung 'dzin pa yong
NK036(chi)008:547: re 'khrul zhes pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed cing
NK036(chi)008:548: bstan par bya'o de nas sgra'i bye brag sna tshogs
NK036(chi)008:549: pas gtor ma nyid mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs la dbul
NK036(chi)008:550: bar bya'o longs spyod spel ba'i phyir tshogs kyi ston
NK036(chi)008:551: mo yang bya'o slob mas rab tu gces pa'i nor
NK036(chi)008:552: bla ma la phul nas mnyes par bya'o de nas
NK036(chi)008:553: slob dpon gyis skye ba med pa'i gdams pa bstan
NK036(chi)008:554: la rang sems ngo shes par bya ngag la brten
NK036(chi)008:555: pa'i bsam gtan rnams bslabs la sgom du gzhug go
NK036(chi)008:556: spros pa med pa'i dbang bskur ba rin po che'i
NK036(chi)008:557: bkod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po sprul
NK036(chi)008:558: pa po dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
NK036(chi)008:559: rgya rgya rgya spros med dbang bskur rin chen bkod
NK036(chi)008:560: pa'i gnad kyi yi ge dam pa bzhugs so man
NK036(chi)008:561: ngag nga bzhi pa'i gras bcom ldan 'das gab pa
NK036(chi)008:562: mngon du 'byin pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po la
NK036(chi)008:563: phyag 'tshal lo yang tig sbas pa gab pa'i yi
NK036(chi)008:564: ge nyid spros med dbang bskur rin chen bkod pa
NK036(chi)008:565: la gab cing sbas dang 'khrugs shing gcus pa'i tshig
NK036(chi)008:566: gab pa mchog gsal yi ge nag po 'dis 'grub
NK036(chi)008:567: cing 'bras bu myur du 'byin pa yi rang bzhin
NK036(chi)008:568: gnad la 'bebs pa'i yi ge ni skal dang ldan
NK036(chi)008:569: pa rnams kyis spyad par bya'o skal pa dang ldan
NK036(chi)008:570: pa rnams kyis dbang bzhi rdzogs par byed par 'dod
NK036(chi)008:571: pa ni sngon du spros bcas kyi dbang gis theg
NK036(chi)008:572: pa rim pa dgu'i lta ba'i don dus gcig la
NK036(chi)008:573: rtogs pa'i thabs la brten nas skal ldan gyi lus
NK036(chi)008:574: la nus pa 'jog par byed la lus kyi dri
NK036(chi)008:575: ma dang zhen pa'i mtha' thams cad dag par byas
NK036(chi)008:576: nas de nas spros pa med pa'i dbang bskur rin
NK036(chi)008:577: po che bkod pas gang gi rnam par rtog pa
NK036(chi)008:578: dang zhen pa'i mtha' dang dri ma thams cad dag
NK036(chi)008:579: par byed pa dang ngag la nus pa bzhag pa'i
NK036(chi)008:580: thabs yin no shin tu spros med kyis yid la
NK036(chi)008:581: nus pa 'jog pa dang yid kyi zhen pa'i mtha'
NK036(chi)008:582: dang dri ma dag par byed pa yin la rab
NK036(chi)008:583: tu spros pa med pas ni sems kyi dri ma
NK036(chi)008:584: dang zhen pa'i mtha' dang rtog pa thams cad dag
NK036(chi)008:585: par byed pa dang sems la nus pa 'jog pa
NK036(chi)008:586: yin no de dag spros bcas kyi rang gi snying
NK036(chi)008:587: ga'i sku rnams la dbang ba dang sku thams cad
NK036(chi)008:588: kyi dbang thob pa'o spros med kyis ni rtsa rnams
NK036(chi)008:589: kyi nang na gnas pa'i thig le la dbang bas
NK036(chi)008:590: thig le thabs kyi dbang thob shin tu spros pa
NK036(chi)008:591: med pa'i dbang bskur gyis ni b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal
NK036(chi)008:592: yas nas khro bo'i sku la dbang bas te khro
NK036(chi)008:593: bo bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang thob
NK036(chi)008:594: rab tu spros pa med pas ni mig nas sgron
NK036(chi)008:595: ma 'char ba la dbang bas sgron ma dang rig
NK036(chi)008:596: pa 'du 'bral med pa'i dbang thob pa'o 'di ni
NK036(chi)008:597: spros pa med pa'i dbang gi rgyab brten gyi yi
NK036(chi)008:598: ge dam pa spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi
NK036(chi)008:599: bar byed pa'i gnad kyi man ngag yang dag pa
NK036(chi)008:600: ni sngon du rdo rje slob dpon rab tu brtag
NK036(chi)008:601: pa gces rang ma dag na nyes pa'i skyon che
NK036(chi)008:602: bas lta sgom gyi don la brtson pa gdan che
NK036(chi)008:603: ba yin no gal te 'jig rten 'di'i spyod yul
NK036(chi)008:604: can gyis byas na gnyis ka rdo rjee dmyal ba'i
NK036(chi)008:605: gnas su sems kyi snang ba 'phang bar 'gyur ba
NK036(chi)008:606: yin no de'i phyir na rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen
NK036(chi)008:607: po'i don la gnas shing 'jig rten gyi bya bas
NK036(chi)008:608: ma yengs pa mdor na 'khor ba'i bya ba spangs
NK036(chi)008:609: pa zhig gis bya'o slob ma yang 'jig rten 'di
NK036(chi)008:610: la mngon zhen log pa 'chi ba mi rtag pa
NK036(chi)008:611: rgyud la skyes pa gtong phod che zhing spyod lam
NK036(chi)008:612: yangs pa rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i don la
NK036(chi)008:613: mos pa phyi 'khor ba'i bya ba la mi 'jug
NK036(chi)008:614: par nges pa 'di nyid kyi don nyams su len
NK036(chi)008:615: nges pa zhig gis bya ba las gzhan gang rung
NK036(chi)008:616: rung gis ma yin no 'jig rten 'di'i blo dang
NK036(chi)008:617: ma bral bar byas na rdo rje dmyal bar sems
NK036(chi)008:618: kyi snang ba 'char bar 'gyur ro des na slob
NK036(chi)008:619: dpon slob ma gnyis ka dag pa gal che'o 'dir
NK036(chi)008:620: gab pa rnams kyi don mngon du phyung te bstan
NK036(chi)008:621: par bya'o rdul tshon gyi bum pa dmar po bsnol
NK036(chi)008:622: ma bri ba ni mkha' dbyings mtshon pa'i don yin
NK036(chi)008:623: no rin po che'i bum pa ni shar phyogs su
NK036(chi)008:624: zer yang 'dir mi bzhag ste shar phyogs su slob
NK036(chi)008:625: ma 'dug pa'i sa yin pas rin po che'i bum
NK036(chi)008:626: pa de nub tu bzhag go me long gsum gyis
NK036(chi)008:627: dbyings mtshon pa ste me long gsum po'i nang du
NK036(chi)008:628: rma bya'i mdongs gsum gyi mdongs bstan la bzhag de
NK036(chi)008:629: nas dbang rdzogs pa'i dus su slob ma la man
NK036(chi)008:630: shel re gtad de re mos kyis gsum gsum la
NK036(chi)008:631: rim gyis ngo sprod pa yin te dang po sprul
NK036(chi)008:632: pa sku'i dbyings dang rig pa la ngo sprad pa
NK036(chi)008:633: gnyis pa longs skur gsum pa chos sku'i dbyings dang
NK036(chi)008:634: rig pa la ngo sprad do kye ma bla ma
NK036(chi)008:635: rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni mngon 'byung
NK036(chi)008:636: du slob dpon gyis lan cig brjod pas lam bstan
NK036(chi)008:637: pa yin gyi de nas lan gsum bdag nyid kyis
NK036(chi)008:638: sna drangs la brjod par bya'o slob dpon gyis rjes
NK036(chi)008:639: gnang lan cig gis chog bsre ba'i dus na mnyam
NK036(chi)008:640: pa'i rgyas gdab pa ni smin mtshams su tsan dan
NK036(chi)008:641: gyi lde gus byugs pas lus grang bsil ba la
NK036(chi)008:642: brten nas mnyam pa nyid skye ba'o a brjod pa
NK036(chi)008:643: ni rlung dang bsres la ci nas kyang ring par
NK036(chi)008:644: bya'o 'di ltar byas pas 'di nyid kyi dus su
NK036(chi)008:645: rang dran pa nyams te rtog med du grol ba
NK036(chi)008:646: yang yod la la ngag tu smra ba dang lus
NK036(chi)008:647: 'phar ba dag tu 'ong ba yin no +aa li
NK036(chi)008:648: dang k+aa li ni thung bar bya'o skabs su drag
NK036(chi)008:649: par bya'o mgrin pa'i rtsa ni gnyid logs g.yon yin
NK036(chi)008:650: mchan khung gi rtsa ni ma yin te gsang ba'i
NK036(chi)008:651: rtsa yin no nu ma ni bud med la yin
NK036(chi)008:652: no skyes pa la rtsib ma g.yas pa'i rtsa manye'o
NK036(chi)008:653: de ltar byas pas rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po
NK036(chi)008:654: nyams su myong ba rgyud la 'jog pa yin no
NK036(chi)008:655: de nas tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni lan
NK036(chi)008:656: gsum gsum du bskyar la bya'o 'di'i dus su dpe
NK036(chi)008:657: du ma la brten nas grol ba yin te ngo
NK036(chi)008:658: sprod nyi shu rtsa gcig po rdzogs par bya de
NK036(chi)008:659: nas 'chi ba rnams brtag gal te 'chi ba'i rtags
NK036(chi)008:660: byung na bslu ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o dbang bskur
NK036(chi)008:661: rin po che bkod pa'i gnad kyi yi ge dam
